This lesson aims to share with you the basic principles and methods of Thematic Mapping and Cartography Design.  You will also gain hands on experience on using [tmap](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/), an R package specially design for plotting cartographic quality maps. 

## Content

-   Classification of maps
-   Principles of map design
-   Thematic mapping techniques
-   Analytical mapping techniques
    -   Percentile map
    -   Box map
    -   Standard deviation map
    -   Mapping rates

## Hands-on Exercise

-   [Choropleth Mapping with R: tmap Methods](https://r4gdsa.netlify.app/chap02.html)
